tips.li: Personality neuroformatters can be used to give new traits to colonists. Each neuroformatter has enough energy to grant multiple traits, but rarer traits cost more energy to grant.

If you have a colonist with the Skulker trait, bring them along on your caravans. Each Skulker lowers the chance the caravan will be detected and ambushed by hostile parties, and when the Skulkers leave the caravan they will temporarily become invisible. Caravans with Skulkers have additional options for interacting with various kinds of world sites, including settlements.
The Mindbender psycast path can be used to add and remove traits. While each individual psycast has its own use, together they can be used to craft personalities of your choice.
